messages.message: Hi can we urgently enable force image ocr on the digitisation settings? I was just caught out badly in a workshop with a customer as it couldn’t see any of the text.

@Lee no. Right now it needs a code change and subsequent deployment. Also, it can have an adverse effect on overall latencies. @Rakesh maybe we should look at a hidden setting to override Process Files settings at a project/user level ?

Thanks. I know it’ll need a release. My request is more about this update being prioritised. It’s really confusing for users that we don’t handle machine readable docs well and there’s no way of fixing it via config

I think it would make sense from a user perspective to have higher latency but a much higher chance the document works in the platform.

Hi @Lee 
Yes we will consider this, discuss on resourcing and share update here. In the meantime are these documents not handled well shareable to us?
Issue seems to be its an editable pdf. Some fields work. Others aren’t picked up. If I screenshot the page and upload that. It all works fine.
